requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Dual-Core 64-bit Intel/AMD Processor, 2.0 GHZ CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB DirectX 11 compatible video card
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+ / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-7440 +
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce 940MX +
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10 x64
  • Processor: i5-6400K - 2.7 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 - 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: Win 10 x64
  • Processor: i7-6700K - 4.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip

  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher with 1GB Memory
